lead_paragraph: An Israeli woman was among the dead in an Istanbul nightclub attack that killed at least 39 people, the Israeli Foreign Ministry said on Sunday.
snippet: An Israeli woman was among the dead in an Istanbul nightclub attack that killed at least 39 people, the Israeli Foreign Ministry said on Sunday....

headline.main: Israeli Woman Killed in Istanbul Nightclub Attack: Israeli Foreign Ministry
headline.print_headline: Israeli Woman Killed in Istanbul Nightclub Attack: Israeli Foreign Ministry
